project.description: For more information about the format of the vcfIndex.tsv file: https://github.com/hms-dbmi/pic-sure-hpds-genotype-load-example?tab=readme-ov-file#loading-your-vcf-data-into-hpds NOTE: Please ensure the paths to VCF files specified in your vcfIndex.tsv file are valid and reachable from inside the docker container. You may need to update the volume mountings specified in this job.

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: partition_name
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: A unique identifier for this partition of genomic data. Patients cannot be in multiple partitions

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: vcf_index_file
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: The location of the VCF index file

hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
rm -rf /usr/local/docker-config/vcf-load/genomic/$partition_name rm -rf /usr/local/docker-config/vcf-load/genomic-merged/$partition_name
docker run --rm --name=hpds-new-vcf-loader-$partition_name \ -v $DOCKER_CONFIG_DIR/vcf-load:/opt/local/hpds \ -v $vcf_index_file:/opt/local/hpds/vcfIndex.tsv \ -v $DOCKER_CONFIG_DIR/vcf-load/genomic/$partition_name:/opt/local/hpds/all \ -v $DOCKER_CONFIG_DIR/vcf-load/genomic-merged/$partition_name:/opt/local/hpds/merged \ -e HEAPSIZE=$heapsize_mb -e LOADER_NAME=SplitChromosomeVcfLoader \ hms-dbmi/pic-sure-hpds-etl:LATEST
docker run --rm --name=hpds-vcf-metadata-loader-$partition_name \ -v $DOCKER_CONFIG_DIR/vcf-load:/opt/local/hpds \ -v $vcf_index_file:/opt/local/hpds/vcfIndex.tsv \ -v $DOCKER_CONFIG_DIR/vcf-load/genomic/$partition_name:/opt/local/hpds/all \ -e HEAPSIZE=$heapsize_mb -e LOADER_NAME=VariantMetadataLoader \ hms-dbmi/pic-sure-hpds-etl:LATEST
docker run --rm --name=genomic-dataset-finalizer-$partition_name \ -v $DOCKER_CONFIG_DIR/vcf-load/genomic/$partition_name:/opt/local/hpds/all \ -e HEAPSIZE=$heapsize_mb -e LOADER_NAME=GenomicDatasetFinalizer \ hms-dbmi/pic-sure-hpds-etl:LATEST
